name: news-globe
description: Spinny 3D globe for the front page of HKI.com.
author: James Harris

scripts.build-en: uglifyjs vendor/two.js vendor/three.js lang/en.js vendor/OBJLoader.js vendor/OBMLoader.min.js js/globe.js -o dist/globe-en.js -c -m
scripts.build-fr: uglifyjs vendor/two.js vendor/three.js lang/fr.js vendor/OBJLoader.js vendor/OBMLoader.min.js js/globe.js -o dist/globe-fr.js -c -m

scripts.build-ru: uglifyjs vendor/two.js vendor/three.js lang/ru.js vendor/OBJLoader.js vendor/OBMLoader.min.js js/globe.js -o dist/globe-ru.js -c -m
scripts.build-es: uglifyjs vendor/two.js vendor/three.js lang/es.js vendor/OBJLoader.js vendor/OBMLoader.min.js js/globe.js -o dist/globe-es.js -c -m
